name: Idli
description: Steamed rice cakes, soft and fluffy, served with sambar and chutneys.

name: Dosa
description: Crispy fermented crepe made from rice and lentils, typically served with sambar and chutneys.

name: Pongal
description: A savory dish made with rice and yellow moong lentils, tempered with cumin, black pepper, and ghee.

name: Vada
description: Deep-fried savory fritters made from black gram batter, crispy and golden brown.

name: Uttapam
description: Thick pancake-like dish made from fermented rice and lentil batter, topped with onions and chilies.

name: Sambar Rice
description: Rice mixed with sambar, a tangy and spicy lentil stew with vegetables.

name: Biryani
description: Aromatic rice dish made with basmati rice, spices, and meat or vegetables.

name: Rasam
description: Spicy and tangy soup made from tamarind, tomatoes, and spices, usually served with rice.

name: Kootu
description: Thick lentil stew with vegetables, seasoned with coconut and spices.

name: Puli Sadam
description: Tamarind rice, tangy and spicy, mixed with tamarind paste and spices.

name: Curd Rice
description: Cooling dish made with rice mixed with yogurt, garnished with mustard seeds and curry leaves.

name: Kothu Parotta
description: Chopped parotta stir-fried with vegetables, eggs, and spices.

name: Idiyappam
description: Rice flour noodles, usually served with coconut milk and curry.

name: Appam
description: Soft and lacy fermented rice pancakes, typically served with coconut milk or stew.

name: Chettinad Chicken
description: Spicy and flavorful chicken curry made with a blend of spices, popular in Chettinad cuisine.

name: Fish Curry
description: Tangy and spicy curry made with fish, tamarind, and a blend of spices.

name: Vada
description: A deep-fried savory fritter made from ground lentils, crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, typically served with chutney and sambar.

name: Potato Bajji
description: Sliced potatoes dipped in a spiced chickpea flour batter and deep-fried until golden brown, often served with chutney.

name: Onion Bajji
description: Thinly sliced onions coated in a spiced chickpea flour batter and deep-fried to perfection, making a crispy and flavorful snack.

name: Banana Bajji
description: Slices of raw banana dipped in a spiced batter and deep-fried, resulting in a crispy and savory treat.

name: Mixture
description: A spicy and crunchy mix of fried chickpea flour noodles, roasted nuts, and puffed rice, seasoned with spices.

name: Murukku
description: A crunchy spiral-shaped snack made from rice flour and urad dal flour, seasoned with sesame seeds and spices.
